species.name: greavard
descriptions: It is said that a dog Pokémon that died in the wild without ever interacting with a human was reborn as this Pokémon.
This friendly Pokémon doesn’t like being alone. Pay it even the slightest bit of attention, and it will follow you forever.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

abilities.name: fluffy
abilities.effect: Damage from contact moves is halved.  Damage from Fire moves is doubled.
